00027 #include "KviCString.h"
00028 #include "KviConsoleWindow.h"
00029 #include "KviPointerHashTable.h"
00030 
00031 class DccWindow;
00032 class DccFileTransfer;
00033 class DccDescriptor
00034 {
00035 public:
00036         DccDescriptor(KviConsoleWindow * pConsole);
00037         DccDescriptor(const DccDescriptor & src);
00038 
00039         ~DccDescriptor();
00040 protected:
00041         KviConsoleWindow         * m_pConsole;
00042 
00043         // mIrc zero port reverse send/chat extension
00044         KviCString               m_szZeroPortRequestTag;
00045 
00046         unsigned int         m_uId; // this dcc session ID
00047         QString              m_szId;
00048 
00049         DccWindow       * m_pDccWindow;   // 0 if it has no window
00050         DccFileTransfer * m_pDccTransfer; // 0 if it is not a transfer
00051 
00052         bool                 m_bCreationEventTriggered;
00053 public:
00054         // A console that this DCC is bound to (might be replaced while we wait for user acknowledge in dialogs)
00055         KviConsoleWindow * console() const { return m_pConsole; };
00056         void setConsole(KviConsoleWindow * c){ m_pConsole = c; };
00057 
00058         DccWindow * window() const { return m_pDccWindow; };
00059         void setWindow(DccWindow * w){ m_pDccWindow = w; };
00060 
00061         DccFileTransfer * transfer() const { return m_pDccTransfer; };
00062         void setTransfer(DccFileTransfer * t){ m_pDccTransfer = t; };
00063 
00064         // mIrc zero port reverse send/chat extension
00065         bool isZeroPortRequest() const { return m_szZeroPortRequestTag.hasData(); };
00066         const char * zeroPortRequestTag() const { return m_szZeroPortRequestTag.ptr(); };
00067         void setZeroPortRequestTag(const KviCString &szTag){ m_szZeroPortRequestTag = szTag; };
00068 
00069         unsigned int id() const { return m_uId; };
00070         const QString & idString() const { return m_szId; };
00071         static DccDescriptor * find(unsigned int uId);
00072         static KviPointerHashTable<int,DccDescriptor> * descriptorDict();
00073 
00074         void triggerCreationEvent(); // this MUST be called by the creator of the descriptor!
00075 private:
00076         void copyFrom(const DccDescriptor &src);
00077 public:
00078         // Generic parameters
00079         QString         szType;            // DCC protocol : CHAT, SCHAT, SEND, TSSEND....
00080 
00081         bool            bActive;           // active or passive connection ?
00082 
00083         QString         szNick;            // remote user nickname
00084         QString         szUser;            // remote user name (unknown for passive dcc)
00085         QString         szHost;            // remote user host (unknown for passive dcc)
00086 
00087         QString         szLocalNick;       // local user nickname (always from irc)
00088         QString         szLocalUser;       // local user username (always from irc)
00089         QString         szLocalHost;       // local user hostname (always from irc)
00090 
00091         QString         szIp;              // remote user ip (active dcc only)
00092         QString         szPort;            // remote user port (active dcc only)
00093 
00094         QString         szListenIp;        // passive only : ip to listen on
00095         QString         szListenPort;      // passive only : port to listen on
00096 
00097         bool            bSendRequest;      // passive only : true if we have to send the CTCP request
00098 
00099         QString         szFakeIp;          // passive only : fake ip to send in the CTCP
00100         QString         szFakePort;        // passive only : fake port to send in the CTCP
00101 
00102         bool            bDoTimeout;        // the marshall has to setup a timeout ?
00103 
00104         bool            bIsTdcc;           // is this a TDCC ?
00105 
00106         bool            bOverrideMinimize; // Override the default minimize option ?
00107         bool            bShowMinimized;    // Show minimized ? (valid if bOverrideMinimize is true)
00108 
00109         bool            bAutoAccept;       // Auto accepted dcc send/chat ?
00110 #ifdef COMPILE_SSL_SUPPORT
00111         bool            bIsSSL;            // do we have to use SSL ?
00112 #endif
00113         // Specific parameters
00114 
00115         // DCC SEND/RECV
00116 
00117         QString         szFileName;        // RECVFILE: incoming file name, SENDFILE: filename sent to the remote end
00118         QString         szFileSize;        // RECVFILE: incoming file size, SENDFILE: remote resume size
00119 
00120         QString         szLocalFileName;   // RECVFILE: save file name selected, SENDFILE: file to send
00121         QString         szLocalFileSize;   // RECVFILE: local file size (to resume), SENDFILE: file to send size
00122 
00123         bool            bRecvFile;         // do we have to RECEIVE the file or SEND it ?
00124         bool            bResume;           // do we want to resume ?
00125         bool            bNoAcks;           // blind dcc send ? (do not receive nor send acknowledges)
00126 
00127         bool            bIsIncomingAvatar; // It is an Incoming Avatar DCC SEND ?
00128 
00129         // DCC VOICE
00130         KviCString          szCodec;           // codec name
00131         int             iSampleRate;       // Sample rate
00132 public:
00133         QString protocol() const { return szType; };
00134         bool isActive() const { return bActive; };
00135         QString remoteNick() const { return szNick; };
00136         QString remoteUser() const { return szUser; };
00137         QString remoteHost() const { return szHost; };
00138         QString remoteIp() const { return szIp; };
00139         QString remotePort() const { return szPort; };
00140         QString remoteFileName() const { return szFileName; };
00141         QString remoteFileSize() const { return szFileSize; };
00142         QString localNick() const { return szLocalNick; };
00143         QString localUser() const { return szLocalUser; };
00144         QString localHost() const { return szLocalHost; };
00145         QString localIp() const { return szIp; };
00146         QString localPort() const { return szPort; };
00147         QString localFileName() const { return szLocalFileName; };
00148         QString localFileSize() const { return szLocalFileSize; };
00149         bool isFileUpload();
00150         bool isFileDownload();
00151         bool isDccChat();
00152         bool isFileTransfer(){ return (isFileUpload() || isFileDownload()); };
00153 #ifdef COMPILE_SSL_SUPPORT
00154         bool isSSL() const { return bIsSSL; };
00155 #endif
00156 };
